definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The entire lower level is set into the ground and acoustically isolated.
sentences.chinese: 整個住宅底層沿着地面地形設置，隔音空間單獨設置。

sentences.english: Applying foam rubber strips for acoustic isolation.
sentences.chinese: 使用泡沫橡膠條進行隔音。

sentences.english: When the window frame is closed , its joint will be tight and resistant to sound and heat.
sentences.chinese: 窗扇關閉時，接縫嚴密，具有良好的隔音，隔熱效果。

sentences.english: Whatever happened to a big, solid, soundproof door?
sentences.chinese: 那些大而結實的隔音門到哪裏去了？

sentences.english: In the off-position, has the good leak-proof quality as well as the heat insulation sound-insulated performance.
sentences.chinese: 在關閉狀態，有良好的密封性以及隔熱隔音性能。

sentences.english: Process for producing fireproof, heat-preserving and noise-insulation metal framework structure, and products produced thereby.
sentences.chinese: 防火，保溫，隔音金屬框架結構的製備方法及其產品。

sentences.english: This double-glazing keeps in the heat and keeps out the noise.
sentences.chinese: 這種雙層玻璃窗既保暖又隔音。

sentences.english: A sound-proof home cinema is also used to play music.
sentences.chinese: 一個隔音家庭影院也可以用來播放音樂。

sentences.english: The doors would not have prevented sounds coming through.
The room's insulation is too bad.
sentences.chinese: 房間的隔音設備太差了。

sentences.english: Soundproof glass muffled any noise, however.
sentences.chinese: 隔音玻璃擋住了裏邊的動靜。

sentences.english: Just the material costs for sound deadening alone were $1000.
sentences.chinese: 僅隔音材料成本一項便花費1000美元。

sentences.english: Shure SE210 "noise" then check " the " headset.
sentences.chinese: 然後檢查了舒爾SE210隔音耳機。

sentences.english: They deafened the room with heavy curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他們用很厚的窗簾使房間隔音。

sentences.english: The soundproofing factory fired Mr. Wu in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 隔音材料的工廠在1999年解僱了吳先生。

sentences.english: 'Also, the sound-proofing is really bad, ' making it near-impossible to have a private phone conversation.
sentences.chinese: 而且隔音很差，打個私人電話都不太可能。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
